name: SUPERBOMBER
description:
Keep your core alive by detonating enemies, but be careful not to detonate yourself!

In SUPERBOMBER you need to pickup the bombs and place them to explode enemies, but your bombs can also damage you, so run away from your bomb and keep your distance from them!

This game was made for the TRIJAM 68 in only 3 HOURS !
The theme was : Keep Your Distance

Controls :
• Left-click : Pickup bomb
• Right-click : Drop bomb
• WASD or Arrows: Move
